name: House of Kaizen
tagline: We are committed to Continuous Improvement
description:
House of Kaizen exists as both an incubator and a sanctuary for performance optimisation. We’re a rare collection of people driven to make it better, delivering digital marketing services to some of the world's most recognisable brands such as The Wall Street Journal, Pfizer, ZipCar, Hearst Media, STA Travel, Avis, SoundCloud, Brainlab and Red Roof Inn.
With a primary focus on the Travel, Subscription and Health categories, we support our clients to achieve better Customer Experience, better Consumer Insights, better Media Buying and Planning, and better Business Intelligence. We combine our expertise to acquire and retain more customer revenue. Our teams are based in London and New York and service accounts spanning more than 12 regions and 16 languages.
